detail_desc: 3/4-length leggings in soft, stretch, printed denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and short slits at the hems.
Top in soft, printed jersey with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a racer back. Double layer at the top. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

Padded jacket in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood and zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastener down the front. Zipped chest pocket, elasticated cuffs, reflective details and a fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
High-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Joggers in soft jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket with a taped zip, and ribbed hems.
Blouse in an airy, patterned, crinkled weave with a small stand-up collar and concealed buttons and flounces at the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Bomber jacket in mesh with reversible sequins.Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Oversized top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Jacket in soft pile with a hood, zip down the front and kangaroo pockets. Unlined.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a high elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Strapless maxi dress in jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and slits in the sides. Integral top with elastication at the top.
Short skirt in stretch cotton twill with contrasting colour seams, a high waist, zip fly and button and large patch pockets. The cotton content of the skirt is partly organic.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shoulder bag in sturdy, grained imitation leather with two handles, a drawstring and detachable, adjustable shoulder strap at the top. Two larger, zipped inner compartments. Unlined. Size 16x27x34 cm.
Warm-lined ankle boots with a zip at one side and loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.
High-waisted trousers in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, back pockets and slim legs with raw-edge hems.

Calf-length coat in a recycled Italian wool blend with notch lapels and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Diagonal side pockets, an inner pocket and a high-cut single back vent. Lining in twill made from recycled polyester.
Gloves in soft leather with a soft, fine-knit lining.
Short-sleeved shirt in soft, washed cotton with a collar, small embroidery detail on the chest, yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand.
Top in soft slub cotton jersey with a motif on the front and round neckline with a narrow trim. Short dolman sleeves and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.
Knitted moccasins with soft terry inside, an imitation leather trim and soft suede soles.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Single-breasted jacket in a stretch dobby weave with peak lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, welt front pockets with a flap and three inner pockets, one with a button. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit.
Stainless steel water bottle with a screw top lid in stainless steel and plastic. Small handle and a strap with a carabiner hook attached to the lid. Capacity 450 ml.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed cotton denim. Relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch, button fly and roomy legs with raw-edge hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a motif, lined, drawstring, wrapover hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft viscose jersey with lace over the shoulders and a rounded hem.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Pleated mesh dress that is transparent at the top with a small frilled collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in the side, a seam at the waist and a double-layered skirt. Lined.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Earrings in metal and plastic in the shape of rings. Diameter 1.7-3 cm.
Bolero and dress in cotton. Bolero in a fine knit with long sleeves and a faceted, heart-shaped button at the top. Sleeveless jersey dress with gathers and elastication at the waist. Unlined.
Metal ear cuffs in various designs.
Short, wide turtleneck jumper in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.

Jacket in soft, patterned pile with a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard and an imitation leather tab. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, side pockets and taped trims around the pockets and hem. Jersey lining.

Sunglasses with metal frames, plastic sidepieces and UV-protective, polarised lenses. Polarised lenses convey colours more clearly and provide stronger contrasts while preventing glare. Supplied in a drawstring fabric pouch.
Cardigan in soft, ribbed jersey with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Bra with self-adhesive cups and no shoulder straps or back making it perfect for wearing under strapless or backless garments. Adjustable lacing at the front. Moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Can be washed and reused.
High-waisted leggings in sturdy jersey with corset lacing at the front and wide elastic at the back.
Shoulder bag with a metal chain shoulder strap, flap with a metal clasp and one inner compartment. Lined. Size 9x10x15 cm.
All-in-one suit in patterned sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and chest pocket. Raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.

Slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed, lightweight denim. Elasticated, paper bag waist with press-studs, a fake fly, diagonal side pockets and wide legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.

Sleeveless, ankle-length jumpsuit in an airy cotton weave with a gentle V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Buttons at the front, an elasticated seam and drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Headbands in a soft knit, one decorated with pearly plastic beads.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a lace trim at the hem.

Dress in soft cotton jersey with a double-layered skirt in glittery tulle. Picot trim around the neckline, a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), short flutter sleeves and a decorative bow at the waist.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a concealed zip in one side and a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Cold shoulder blouse in a viscose weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastication and a flounce at the top, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a smocked hem.
Leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in soft viscose jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and lace trims.
Trousers in washed, stretch twill. High waist with a detachable belt, zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets, back pockets and slim legs.

T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Leggings in glossy, patterned jersey with an elasticated waist.

Trousers in woven fabric with a sheen. Elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, zipped side pockets and a welt back pocket. Gently tapered legs with sewn-in creases, stripes down the sides and slits with two press-studs at the hems.
Sandals with cork wedge heels and heel straps that are elasticated at the back. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform front 3.5 cm, heel 11 cm.
Wide, A-line blouse in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and opening at the neck with ties. Long, voluminous sleeves with ties at the cuffs.
Sleeveless, straight-cut, knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Rib-knit socks in a soft organic cotton blend.
Three-strand necklace of metal chains in various designs with plastic beads and metal pendants. Adjustable length 44-50 cm.
Scarf in a soft weave with a brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides. Size 65x195 cm.
Patterned playsuit with narrow, frill-trimmed shoulder straps, decorative buttons down the front, an elasticated seam at the waist and short legs with frill-trimmed elasticated hems.
Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details.
Sleeveless, double-layered top in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, and no fasteners. Lined.
Long-sleeved blouse in a crinkled, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a flounce at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Trainers in shimmering imitation leather with elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
V-neck T-shirts in soft jersey.
Shirt jacket in twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Cargo joggers in an airy cotton and linen weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, back pockets, flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs, and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Long, straight-cut shirt in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pockets with a pleat, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Gloves in soft, supple imitation leather. Lined.
Glittery ballet pumps with a decorative bow at the front, elastic strap over the foot and grosgrain trim around the top. Satin insoles.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a chest pocket and roll edges around the neckline and sleeves.

Sleeveless playsuit in soft, patterned viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back and horizontal ties at the back of the neck. Wrapover, draped front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the neckline, an elasticated, smocked seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs.
Thigh boots in soft imitation suede with a silicone trim at the top, pointed toes and covered heels. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Top in a soft viscose weave with a wide, elasticated neckline, short raglan sleeves with a tie at the sleeve-ends, and an elasticated hem.
Playsuit in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
